title: Reinforcement Learning Course - Full Machine Learning Tutorial
excerpt: Reinforcement learning is an area of machine learning that involves taking right action to maximize reward in a particular situation. In this full tutorial course, you will get a solid foundation in reinforcement learning core topics.  The course covers Q learning, SARSA, double Q learning, deep Q learning,
